faqs.title: よくある質問
faqs.subtitle: PDFツールについて知っておくべきすべて

item-1.question: ファイルはサーバーにアップロードされますか？
item-1.answer: いいえ。すべての処理はJavaScriptを使用してブラウザで直接行われます。ファイルはデバイスから出ないため、完全なプライバシーが保証されます。

item-2.question: ファイルサイズに制限はありますか？
item-2.answer: 最大100MBまでのファイルに対応しています。実際の制限は、ブラウザの利用可能なメモリとデバイスの機能に依存します。

item-3.question: ツールは本当に無料ですか？
item-3.answer: はい、すべてのPDFツールは登録不要、ウォーターマークなし、制限なしで完全に無料です。

item-4.question: PDFの品質は影響を受けますか？
item-4.answer: いいえ、ツールはPDFの元の品質を保持します。結合、分割、回転などの操作はロスレスです。

item-5.question: どのブラウザに対応していますか？
item-5.answer: Chrome、Firefox、Safari、Edgeなど、すべての最新ブラウザで動作します。最高の体験のため、ブラウザを最新版にしてください。

mergePdf.name: PDF結合
mergePdf.description: 複数のPDFファイルを1つのドキュメントに結合します。
mergePdf.metaTitle: Merge PDF Files Online Free - PDF Combiner
mergePdf.metaDescription: Merge multiple PDF files into one document for free. Drag and drop to reorder. Browser-based, no uploads needed.
mergePdf.longDescription: Combine multiple PDF documents into a single file quickly and easily. Drag and drop your PDF files, arrange them in your preferred order, and merge. All processing happens locally in your browser.

item-1.question: How many PDF files can I merge at once?
item-1.answer: There is no hard limit on the number of files. However, very large files may take longer to process depending on your device's memory.

item-2.question: Will merging reduce the quality of my PDFs?
item-2.answer: No. The merge operation preserves the original quality of all pages. No recompression or quality loss occurs.

item-3.question: Are my files uploaded to a server?
item-3.answer: No. All processing happens directly in your browser. Your files never leave your device.

item-4.question: Can I reorder pages before merging?
item-4.answer: Yes. You can drag and drop files to change their order before merging them into a single PDF.

item-5.question: What is the maximum file size?
item-5.answer: Files up to 100MB each are supported. The actual limit depends on your browser's available memory.

item-1.title: Combining Business Reports
item-1.description: Merge monthly reports, financial statements, and appendices into a single comprehensive document.

item-2.title: Assembling Applications
item-2.description: Combine cover letters, resumes, transcripts, and certificates into one application PDF.

item-3.title: Creating Course Materials
item-3.description: Merge lecture slides, reading materials, and assignments into unified course packets.

item-4.title: Archiving Documents
item-4.description: Combine related documents into organized archive files for long-term storage.

splitPdf.name: PDF分割
splitPdf.description: PDFを個別のページまたはカスタム範囲に分割します。
splitPdf.metaTitle: Split PDF Online Free - Extract PDF Pages
splitPdf.metaDescription: Split PDF files into individual pages or custom page ranges for free. Browser-based, no uploads needed.
splitPdf.longDescription: Split a PDF document into individual pages or extract specific page ranges. Select which pages you want to extract, and download them as separate PDF files.

item-1.question: Can I split a PDF into individual pages?
item-1.answer: Yes. You can split a PDF into individual single-page files or define custom page ranges.

item-2.question: Can I extract specific pages from a PDF?
item-2.answer: Yes. Select the exact pages or page ranges you want to extract from the original document.

item-3.question: Will splitting affect the page quality?
item-3.answer: No. Each extracted page maintains the original quality and formatting.

item-4.question: How do I define custom page ranges?
item-4.answer: Enter page ranges like '1-3, 5, 7-9' to extract those specific pages into separate files.

item-5.question: Is there a page limit?
item-5.answer: No fixed limit. The tool can handle large PDFs, limited only by your browser's memory.

item-1.title: Extracting Specific Chapters
item-1.description: Pull individual chapters from a large document for focused reading or sharing.

item-2.title: Removing Unwanted Pages
item-2.description: Extract only the pages you need, effectively removing unwanted content.

item-3.title: Creating Handouts
item-3.description: Extract specific slides or pages from presentations to create focused handouts.

item-4.title: Breaking Down Large Documents
item-4.description: Split lengthy reports into manageable sections for easier distribution.

compressPdf.name: PDF圧縮
compressPdf.description: 品質を保持しながらPDFファイルサイズを縮小します。
compressPdf.metaTitle: Compress PDF Online Free - Reduce PDF File Size
compressPdf.metaDescription: Compress PDF files to reduce file size for free. Optimize PDFs for email and web. Browser-based, no uploads needed.
compressPdf.longDescription: Reduce the file size of your PDF documents by removing unused objects and optimizing the document structure. Perfect for making PDFs easier to share via email or upload to websites.

item-1.question: How much can my PDF be compressed?
item-1.answer: Compression results vary depending on the PDF content. Documents with large embedded images see the most reduction.

item-2.question: Will compression reduce the visual quality?
item-2.answer: The optimization focuses on removing unused objects and streamlining the file structure. Visual quality is preserved.

item-3.question: Can I compress multiple PDFs at once?
item-3.answer: Currently, you can compress one PDF at a time. Process each file individually for best results.

item-4.question: What if the compressed file is the same size?
item-4.answer: If the PDF is already optimized, compression may not reduce the size significantly. The tool will show you the before and after sizes.

item-5.question: Is the compression lossless?
item-5.answer: Yes. The compression removes redundant data without affecting the visible content of the document.

item-1.title: Email Attachments
item-1.description: Reduce PDF size to meet email attachment limits and send documents more easily.

item-2.title: Web Upload
item-2.description: Optimize PDFs for faster upload and download on websites and online forms.

item-3.title: Storage Optimization
item-3.description: Reduce the storage space needed for large PDF archives.

item-4.title: Faster Sharing
item-4.description: Smaller files transfer faster through messaging apps and file sharing services.

rotatePdf.name: PDF回転
rotatePdf.description: PDFページを正しい向きに回転します。
rotatePdf.metaDescription: Rotate PDF pages by 90, 180, or 270 degrees for free. Fix page orientation easily. Browser-based, no uploads needed.
rotatePdf.longDescription: Rotate individual pages or all pages in your PDF document. Fix incorrectly oriented pages by rotating them 90, 180, or 270 degrees. Preview each page before applying changes.

item-1.question: Can I rotate individual pages?
item-1.answer: Yes. You can rotate each page independently or apply the same rotation to all pages at once.

item-2.question: What rotation angles are supported?
item-2.answer: You can rotate pages by 90° (clockwise), 180°, or 270° (counter-clockwise).

item-3.question: Will rotation affect the content quality?
item-3.answer: No. Rotation only changes the page orientation without any effect on content quality.

item-4.question: Can I preview pages before rotating?
item-4.answer: Yes. You can see thumbnails of all pages and preview the rotation before applying it.

item-5.question: Can I undo a rotation?
item-5.answer: Yes. Simply rotate the page again to return it to the original orientation, or start over.

item-1.title: Fixing Scanned Documents

item-2.title: Landscape to Portrait

item-3.title: Presentation Preparation
item-3.description: Ensure all pages in a document are oriented correctly before presenting or printing.

item-4.title: Mixed Orientation Documents
item-4.description: Fix documents where some pages are rotated differently from others.

pdfToPng.name: PDFをPNGに変換 + 長い画像
pdfToPng.description: PDFページを高品質のPNG画像に変換します。
pdfToPng.metaTitle: Convert PDF to PNG Online Free - PDF to PNG Converter
pdfToPng.metaDescription: Convert PDF pages to PNG images for free. Merge multiple pages into one long image. High-quality lossless conversion with adjustable resolution. Browser-based, no uploads needed.
pdfToPng.longDescription: Convert each page of your PDF document into high-quality PNG images with lossless compression. PNG preserves sharp text and graphics perfectly, making it ideal for documents, screenshots, and images requiring transparency support. Option to merge all pages into a single long image for easy social media sharing.

item-1.question: Why choose PNG over other formats?
item-1.answer: PNG uses lossless compression, meaning no quality is lost during conversion. It preserves sharp text, clean lines, and supports transparency — ideal for documents and graphics.

item-2.question: Can I adjust the image resolution?
item-2.answer: Yes. Use the scale slider to set the output resolution from 1x to 4x. The default is 2x (144 DPI), suitable for most use cases.

item-3.question: Will PNG files be larger than JPG?
item-3.answer: Generally yes, because PNG uses lossless compression. However, for text-heavy documents, the difference is often minimal while the quality is noticeably better.

item-4.question: Does PNG support transparency?
item-4.answer: Yes. PNG supports alpha transparency, so any transparent areas in your PDF will be preserved in the output images.

item-5.question: Can I convert a multi-page PDF?
item-5.answer: Yes. Each page is converted to a separate PNG file that you can download individually.

item-1.title: Document Archiving
item-1.description: Convert important documents to PNG for lossless archival storage.

item-2.title: Web Publishing
item-2.description: Create crisp PNG images from PDF content for websites and blogs.

item-3.title: Design Assets
item-3.description: Extract pages as high-quality PNG files for use in graphic design projects.

item-4.title: Presentation Materials
item-4.description: Convert PDF slides to PNG images for embedding in presentations.

pdfToJpg.name: PDFをJPGに変換 + 長い画像
pdfToJpg.description: PDFページを品質調整可能なJPG画像に変換します。
pdfToJpg.metaTitle: Convert PDF to JPG Online Free - PDF to JPEG Converter
pdfToJpg.metaDescription: Convert PDF pages to JPG images for free. Merge multiple pages into one long image. Adjustable quality and resolution settings. Browser-based, no uploads needed.
pdfToJpg.longDescription: Convert each page of your PDF document into JPG images. Adjust the quality and resolution to balance file size and visual fidelity. JPG is the most widely supported image format, ideal for photos, web use, and sharing. Option to merge all pages into a single long image for easy social media sharing.

item-1.question: Can I adjust the JPG quality?
item-1.answer: Yes. Use the quality slider to set output quality from 10% to 100%. Higher quality means larger file sizes but better visual fidelity.

item-2.question: What resolution will the images be?
item-2.answer: The default is 2x scale (144 DPI). You can increase up to 4x for high-resolution output or decrease to 1x for smaller files.

item-3.question: What is the difference between JPG and PNG?
item-3.answer: JPG uses lossy compression for smaller files, best for photos. PNG uses lossless compression for perfect quality, best for text and graphics.

item-4.question: Can I convert a multi-page PDF?
item-4.answer: Yes. Each page is converted to a separate JPG file that you can download individually.

item-5.question: Will colors be preserved accurately?
item-5.answer: Yes. JPG supports millions of colors and handles photographs and gradient-rich documents very well.

item-2.title: Email Attachments

item-3.title: Website Thumbnails

pdfToWebp.name: PDFをWebPに変換 + 長い画像
pdfToWebp.description: PDFページを圧縮効率の優れたモダンなWebP画像に変換します。
pdfToWebp.metaTitle: Convert PDF to WebP Online Free - PDF to WebP Converter
pdfToWebp.metaDescription: Convert PDF pages to WebP images for free. Merge multiple pages into one long image. Modern format with superior compression and quality. Browser-based, no uploads needed.
pdfToWebp.longDescription: Convert each page of your PDF document into WebP images, the modern image format developed by Google. WebP offers superior compression with excellent visual quality, resulting in significantly smaller file sizes compared to JPG and PNG. Option to merge all pages into a single long image for easy social media sharing.

item-1.question: What is WebP format?
item-1.answer: WebP is a modern image format developed by Google that provides superior lossy and lossless compression. It produces smaller files than JPG and PNG while maintaining comparable quality.

item-2.question: Is WebP supported by all browsers?
item-2.answer: WebP is supported by all modern browsers including Chrome, Firefox, Edge, and Safari 16+. It has over 97% global browser support.

item-3.question: Can I adjust the WebP quality?
item-3.answer: Yes. Use the quality slider to balance file size and visual quality. Lower quality produces smaller files, while higher quality preserves more detail.

item-4.question: How does WebP compare to JPG?
item-4.answer: WebP typically produces files 25-35% smaller than JPG at equivalent visual quality, making it ideal for web use where bandwidth matters.

item-5.question: Can I convert a multi-page PDF?
item-5.answer: Yes. Each page is converted to a separate WebP file that you can download individually.

item-1.title: Web Optimization
item-1.description: Create WebP images for faster website loading with smaller file sizes.

item-2.title: Bandwidth Reduction
item-2.description: Convert PDFs to WebP for efficient delivery in bandwidth-constrained environments.

item-3.title: CDN & Hosting
item-3.description: Generate WebP images to reduce storage and delivery costs on CDNs.

item-4.title: Modern Web Development

pngToPdf.metaDescription: Convert PNG images to PDF for free. Arrange and combine multiple PNGs into one PDF. Browser-based, no uploads needed.
pngToPdf.longDescription: Convert your PNG images into a PDF document. Upload multiple PNG files, arrange them in the desired order with drag-and-drop, and combine them into a single PDF. Image quality is preserved at the original resolution.

item-1.question: Will PNG quality be preserved in the PDF?
item-1.answer: Yes. PNG images are embedded at their original resolution in the PDF. No compression is applied during conversion.

item-2.question: Can I reorder images before converting?
item-2.answer: Yes. Drag and drop to arrange your PNG images in the preferred order before creating the PDF.

item-3.question: Is transparency preserved in the PDF?
item-3.answer: PNG transparency is preserved when the image is embedded in the PDF, though the PDF viewer may display transparent areas as white.

item-4.question: How many PNG images can I combine?
item-4.answer: There is no hard limit. The number of images you can process depends on your device's available memory.

item-5.question: What will the page size be?
item-5.answer: Each PDF page is automatically sized to match the dimensions of its corresponding PNG image.

item-1.question: How does the comparison work?
item-1.answer: The tool extracts text from both PDFs, compares line by line, highlighting differences: green for added content, red for deleted content.

item-2.question: Can scanned PDFs be compared?
item-2.answer: Scanned PDFs contain images rather than text, so text differences cannot be directly compared. Please use an OCR tool to convert to a searchable PDF first.

item-3.question: How accurate are the comparison results?
item-3.answer: The tool compares text content, ignoring format differences. If documents have the same content but different formatting, they will be shown as having no differences.

item-4.question: Are multi-page documents supported?
item-4.answer: Yes. The tool compares all pages of the entire document, showing an overall difference summary and detailed comparison.

item-5.question: Can comparison results be exported?

item-1.question: What is the difference between redaction and overlaying?
item-1.answer: Redaction permanently deletes content and cannot be recovered; overlaying only places a mask over the content, and the underlying data still exists. Redaction provides true secure deletion.

item-2.question: Can redaction be undone?
item-2.answer: No. Redaction is permanent. Please be sure to keep a backup of the original document in case you need the unredacted version.

item-3.question: What content can be redacted?
item-3.answer: Text, images, and page areas can be redacted. Select the content to redact, and the tool will permanently remove it from the document.

item-4.question: What is the quality of the redacted document?
item-4.answer: Redacted areas are replaced with black or white blocks, surrounding content remains unchanged, and the rest of the document quality is unaffected.

item-5.question: How to ensure thorough redaction?
item-5.answer: This tool uses the pdf-lib library to truly delete content, not just overlay it. Redacted content cannot be recovered by text extraction tools.

item-3.question: Will OCR change the document appearance?
item-3.answer: No. OCR adds a transparent text layer over the original image. The document appearance remains unchanged, but text becomes selectable and searchable.

item-4.question: Can it process multi-page documents?
item-4.answer: Yes. The tool processes multi-page PDFs page by page, performing OCR recognition on each page.

item-5.question: What is the processing speed?

item-5.question: Will sanitization reduce file size?
item-5.answer: It may reduce slightly, especially when removing embedded files or large numbers of annotations. But the main purpose is security rather than compression.

item-1.question: Can the verification tool confirm if a signature is legally valid?
item-1.answer: It can detect the presence and basic information of signatures, but complete cryptographic verification requires certificate chain validation. The tool displays signature structure and integrity information.

item-2.question: Can it detect if a document has been tampered with?
item-2.answer: It can detect whether the document structure is complete and whether the digital signature is intact. If signature verification fails, it may indicate the document has been modified.

item-3.question: What is the JavaScript risk in PDFs?
item-3.answer: JavaScript in PDFs can execute automatic actions, which while useful can also be misused. The verification tool identifies documents containing JavaScript.

item-4.question: Can encrypted PDFs be verified?
item-4.answer: Yes. The tool detects encryption status and displays relevant information, but full content analysis requires decryption.

item-5.question: What are embedded files in the verification results?
item-5.answer: PDFs can embed other files (like attachments). The verification tool identifies these embedded contents to help you understand all data contained in the document.
